title: S5 mid/supp looking for ranked 5's
body:
Yo, I'm Silver V, mainly play mid and support, I'm looking for a full 5 team to play regularly with to climb. 

I'm easy to get along with and can take criticism if you've got something to teach. Basically I can't seem to climb without a few players on teams going 0/6 by 5 minutes, so I'm looking for people who can at least hold lane if things go south.
